119

Growing among woodland duff next to small fallen hardwood tree (maybe elm) in mixed oak woodland. 

- Cap hygrophanous with slightly in-rolled margin.
- Gills close and shallow. 
- Stipe white, hallow with white squamules.  
- Rhizomorphs present.
